name: DoomScroller VR
description:
*DISCLAIMER* - Farts and Memes

Ever find yourself endlessly scrolling on a social media site? Have you ever combined social media scrolling with sitting on the porcelain throne? If you answered yes to both those things then you are a victim of "DOOMSCROLLING"! With five easy payments of....ehhh just play the game and you'll see.

Made during the Global Game Jam 2023

https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/doomscroller-vr-8
